Barb, of all interesting things! I tried this several times at home and saw=
 only the poster thing and the article, but I tried it at work today (on br=
eak, of course!) and this computer doesn't recognize any of the Japanese ch=
aracters, but the video block came up and played just fine. I must be missi=
ng a program to play it on at home, so it was never recognized. Pretty darn=
ed cool - I'm liking the guy playing Saito.=C2=A0
